question: Which non-banking finance company has won the 2018 NABARD award for its service to Self-Help Group (SHG) linkage?
explanation: Repco Micro Finance Ltd (RMFL), a non-banking finance company promoted by Repco Bank, has won the 2018  NABARD award for its service to Self-Help Group (SHG) linkage in Tamil Nadu for the fiscal year 2017-18. Since its inception, the NBFC has disbursed loans amounting to Rs 2,500 crore to over 10 lakh beneficiaries through 50,000 SHGs.
